title: What’s the Outlook for Big Tech, Crypto and ESG
description: Barron's associate editor Reshma Kapadia and DataTrek Research market strategist Nicholas Colas discuss why U.S. stocks are still the best game in town, the outlook for cryptocurrencies and why inflation isn’t a bogeyman for U.S. investors.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's associate editor Reshma Kapadia and DataTrek Research market strategist Nicholas Colas discuss why U.S. stocks are still the best game in town, the outlook for cryptocurrencies and why inflation isn’t a bogeyman for U.S. investors.
